title: Hillsborough deputies investigate deadly New Year's Day shooting
content:
VALRICO --
The Hillsborough County Sheriff's Office is investigating a fatal shooting that occurred on New Year's Day.
Teenager shot and killed on New Year's Day
Hillsborough Sheriff's Office is investigating
Suspect is being questioned by detectives
Deputies were called out to a home on Cabbage Palm Drive in Valrico Sunday night in response to a shooting.
The victim, Jayquon Johnson, 17, was taken to a local hospital, where he died.
Officials said the shooter stayed at the scene until officials arrived and is being questioned by detectives. They're also interviewing potential witnesses.
Deputies have not released any names or additional details about what happened.
